section1.title:
Positive Impact,
The Memory of the Process
section1.description: Eventually, part of my donation led to the decision to use it for the expansion of the School of Computing.
section1.speaker: From the remarks of Byung-Gyu Chang, Chairman of KRAFTON, KAIST School of Computing Alumnus

section2.title:
KRAFTON X SoC,
Design Story
section2.description: The beginning of this space was the single word 'connection', but in the process, we embedded deeper thoughts on 'how connection can be experienced'.

section3.title:
A Space Where
Positive Impact Circulates
section3.description: This is a Pay It Forward space, a space of connection where we share our gratitude with our juniors.
section3.descriptionDesktop:
This is a Pay It Forward space, a space of connection
where we share our gratitude with our juniors.
section3.speaker: From the remarks of Suk-Young Ryu, Head of School, KAIST School of Computing Alumnus
